title: Kopf Mit Rotem Aufsatz
provenance_text:
Josef Mikl [1929-2008], Vienna, Austria; Galerie Der Spiegel, Cologne, Germany; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was included (no. 261, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by Galerie Der Spiegel.
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International. It was accessioned on October 17, 1961. Payment to Galerie Der Spiegel was sent on November 24, 1961.
